name: Outro
_source: speak;Anthony;Your father granted us safe passage, Norris.{w}{clear}What is the meaning of this attack?
speak;Anthony;Is that reason enough to attack us?
speak;Norris;I don't need a reason!{w}{clear}You lot are a pack of lying,{w} flea-ridden,{w} good-for-nothing criminals,{w} who are a threat to the national security of this nation!
speak;Marcel;Sure it's not because I took your sister?
speak;James;Jesus, Norris.{w}{clear}What's the matter?{w}{clear}Something nice happen to you?
speak;Anthony;If you provoke or threaten my comrades any further, Norris,{w} I can't be held responsible for the actions that may follow.
speak;Norris;When have you ever been held responsible for any of your actions,{w} war-mongrel?
speak;Anthony;So the head of state's daugther?
speak;Anthony;Did you get permission to marry her?
speak;Anthony;Do you not see the mess you've put us in?{w}{clear}Norris said it was on orders of his father -{w} the Duke! -{w} to arrest you.{w}{clear}They'll be after us as long as we stay here.
speak;Anthony;Norris must have followed us to lead him to you.
speak;James;If that's the case though -{w}{clear}They likely wouldn't have let us in unless Marcel married Madeline.
speak;Anthony;Yes, but if Marcel wasn't here -{w} Marcel, why are you here?
speak;Marcel;To negotiate a trade deal.{w}{clear}Had to be done in secret to preserve Setanta's neutrality.
speak;Anthony;And you met Madeline during these negotiations?
speak;Marcel;The cottage we lived in was owned by one of Crucible's former kings.{w}{clear}Father made me aware of its location in case of emergency.
speak;Anthony;Did he tell you how to get out of this country-wide jail cell?
speak;James;Relax.{w}{clear}This may be a jail-cell,{w} but we have a key.{w}{clear}{c:mirror_portrait;James;no_block}Right, Norris?
speak;Anthony;What do you mean?{w}{clear}No,{w} wait,{w} I see.{w}{clear}Keep him hostage,{w} then trade him in.
speak;James;See?{w}{clear}It all works out in the end.{w}{clear}Come on Marcel, let's get you introduced.
speak;Hamsen;I was just speaking to your wife, Marcel.{w}{clear}A very charming young woman.
speak;Marcel;Nice to meet you again, Hamsen.
speak;Hamsen;Have you met my daughter -{w} where is she off to? -{w} Alice!
speak;Hamsen;This is Prince Marcel,{w} second in line to the throne of Crucible.
speak;Hamsen;And over here is our resident magical prodigy of various wild and energetic elements -{w}{clear}Mirabelladonnabelle{br}Henagainahennessey.
speak;James;Marcel, this is Elizabeth.{w}{clear}Liz, this is Marcel.
speak;Alice;She said she went into town.{w}{clear}To speak to the villagers.
speak;Madeline;Why did you attack us?{w}{clear}Don't you know that it's wrong to try to kill people?
speak;VillagerMaddy2;We had no choice!{w}{clear}We were ordered to!;;115;;;;;;1
speak;Madeline;You can't just avoid the consequences of your actions by following orders,{w} and abdicating personal responsibility!
speak;VillagerMaddy2;Easy for you to say!{w}{clear}You can say whatever you like,{w} but we all know that if we disobeyed,{w} we wouldn't have a house to hold over our heads!

speak;Madeline;One minute they're our friendly neighbours,{w} the next they're out for our blood!{w}{clear}For two months we've been living here -{w} two months! -{w} and yet today,{w} they're acting as if they never met us in their entire lives.{w}{clear}Like we're complete strangers!
speak;Marcel;But we always were strangers here, Madeline.
speak;Charles;Listen to your husband, princess,{w} we don't owe you a thing!
# The villagers part, one walks forward.

speak;Madeline;Do you honestly think you're a good person for treating us in this fashion?{w}{clear}Do you?{w}{clear}Friendly as long as it benefits you.|Kind so long as it costs nothing.{w}{clear}If this is how you treat us now,{w} then what was the point of your past politeness?{w}{clear}Please,{w} tell us the truth.
speak;Madeline;But they can't!{w}{clear}Marcel, they can't just get away with it.
speak;Madeline;How can you accept leaving things like this?
speak;Marcel;Walk with me.{w}{clear}Back to the house.{w}{clear}There I'll explain.;;110;;;;;;1
speak;Madeline;But what about the others?{w}{clear}Aren't they waiting?
speak;Marcel;It's all right.{w}{clear}The sun's still up.{w}{clear}We have time.;;100;;;;;;1
